SmugMug

Mover and SmugMug

SmugMug accommodates the photo sharing needs of millions of customers and billions of photos.

Many of these precious memories and professional photographs eventually find their way around the web, and now they can do it even quicker with the Mover SmugMug Connector!

This Mover SmugMug Connector is compatible with Mover’s full range of services, and supports bi-directional migration. Customers can now take advantage of services such as differential transfers, scheduling, and archiving, to do things such as:

  • Move photos in and out SmugMug from other storage sites such as Dropbox.
  • Create backups of your photos in other storage sites, and vice versa.
  • Design schedules for moving your photos around cloud storages.
  • Design schedules for backing up your photos to secure them.

Our SmugMug Connector follows the same strict security standards as all other Mover services.

Every file transfer made through us is encrypted from end to end to ensure these valuable files are secure, and we are always improving our security practices. All of our users are encouraged to review our Security Overview.

This SmugMug Connector is designed to ensure you are able to better manage your digital photos and ensure they are always readily available.
